Title: Game of Thrones
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Lena Headey, Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington
Plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for thousands of years.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 273 wins & 454 nominations.

Title: Friends
Actors: Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc
Plot: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 68 wins & 211 nominations.

Title: Black Mirror
Actors: Daniel Lapaine, Hannah John-Kamen, Michaela Coel, Beatrice Robertson-Jones
Plot: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech world where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.
Awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 13 wins & 43 nominations.

Title: The Big Bang Theory
Actors: Kaley Cuoco, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg
Plot: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.
Language: English, Hindi, Italian, Russian, Mandarin, Klingon
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 66 wins & 222 nominations.

Title: Pretty Little Liars
Actors: Troian Bellisario, Ashley Benson, Lucy Hale, Shay Mitchell
Plot: Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while also investigating the disappearance of their best friend.

Title: The Walking Dead
Actors: Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Andrew Lincoln, Lauren Cohan
Plot: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins, and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 67 wins & 190 nominations.

Title: Stranger Things
Genre: Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard, Millie Bobby Brown
Plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces in order to get him back.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 32 wins & 114 nominations.

Title: La casa de papel
Actors: Úrsula Corberó, Itziar Ituño, Álvaro Morte, Alba Flores
Plot: A group of very peculiar robbers assault the Factory of Moneda and Timbre to carry out the most perfect robbery in the history of Spain and take home 2.4 billion euros.

Title: 13 Reasons Why
Actors: Caleb Pilkenton, Dylan Minnette, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Follows teenager Clay Jensen, in his quest to uncover the story behind his classmate and crush, Hannah, and her decision to end her life.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.
